entry.summary: ...INCREASING POTENTIAL FOR SIGNIFICANT SNOW LATE THIS WEEK ACROSS PARTS OF SOUTHEAST ALASKA... entry.summary: ...Potential for ice jams on the Kenai River from Kenai Keys to Soldotna... entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 10:28AM MST until December 22 at 6:00AM MST by NWS

entry.summary: ...SNOW LIKELY AND HAZARDOUS TRAVEL EXPECTED THURSDAY AFTERNOON INTO THURSDAY EVENING... There is the potential for pockets of moderate to heavy snow behind the front.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 12:06PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: After a very cold Thursday morning another round of precipitation will move in, impacting the inland Northwest by the afternoon. This system will start out producing snow in the afternoon in central Oregon and spread across the rest of the forecast area overnight. Precipitation will change over to a wintry mix of snow sleet and freezing rain in central Oregon Thursday night.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 12:06PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: After a very cold Thursday morning another round of precipitation will move in, impacting the inland Northwest by the afternoon. This system will start out producing snow in the afternoon in central Oregon and spread across the rest of the forecast area overnight. Precipitation will change over to a wintry mix of snow sleet and freezing rain in central Oregon Thursday night.
